Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: TimeSlider
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: jserrano@conwet.com, sblanco@conwet.com
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: Do not find what you want? Use the time slider to filter your searches!

Preference.name: clustering
Preference.description: Check it if you want clusters in your timeLine
Preference.label: Clustering

Preference.name: time
Preference.description: Set the time you want to see info/warning/error text
Preference.label: Text time

InputEndpoint.name: markInsertInput
InputEndpoint.description: Insert a mark to show in the timeLine
InputEndpoint.label: Insert mark

InputEndpoint.name: markSelectInput
InputEndpoint.description: Select a showed mark in the timeLine
InputEndpoint.label: Select mark

InputEndpoint.name: markDeleteInput
InputEndpoint.description: Delete an existing mark in the timeLine
InputEndpoint.label: Delete mark

OutputEndpoint.name: timeIntervalOutput
OutputEndpoint.description: Send a timestamp via wiring to be used as a temporary filter.
OutputEndpoint.label: Time Interval

OutputEndpoint.name: selectedMarkOutput
OutputEndpoint.description: Send the current selected mark in the Time Slider.
OutputEndpoint.label: Selected mark
